schema.title: CW721
schema.description: Allows users to launch their own custom NFT projects.

minter.description: The minter is the only one who can create new NFTs. This is designed for a base NFT that is controlled by an external program or contract. You will likely replace this with custom logic in custom NFTs

identifier.description: Can be either an address or identifier of an ADO in a app.

minter.title: minter

items.description: A struct describing a token module, provided with the instantiation message this struct is used to record the info about the module and how/if it should be instantiated

identifier.description: Can be either an address or identifier of an ADO in a app.

ui:options.title: Token/NFT Name
ui:options.help: Has to be between 3 and 30 characters.

ui:options.title: Token/NFT Symbol
ui:options.description: The address of the token minter.
ui:options.help: Has to be between 3 and 12 alphabetic characters.

ui:options.title: Minter Address
ui:options.description: The address of the token minter.

ui:options.title: Identifier Address
ui:options.help: Can be either an address or identifier of an ADO in an app.
